March 23, 2005 POLICY MATTER C ADMNISTRATIONFINANCE (101/2005) (Decision taken on note No 11011/10/99-CF(Pt ) dated 29.12.2004 of PC Division Sub Coordination with Nodal Officers On the request of the Authority; the State Governments have appointed Nodal Officers for coordination of work relation to National Highways Development Project: The officers are of the level of Principal Secretary Secretary Commissioner in the State Government. The  concerned  Technical Division and Project Directors are taking up issues related to their works with the State Nodal Officer appointed by the State Government: 2 It has been observed that in some State review meetings are not held regularly by the designated Nodal Officers. It is imperative that meetings are held at regular intervals in order to deal with all outstanding issues and particularly those which are hindering pace of work and pre-construction activities. Project Directors are requested to ensure through constant follow up that the meetings are convened by the Nodal Officers on regular basis. This should be closely monitored by the Technical Division:. 3_ In order to facilitate early resolution of outstanding issues with various State Government agencies, it has also been decided that project specific issues will be followed up with State Government by concerned CGMs / GMs at the Hqs. However, at local level, PDs of the PIUsICMUs will follow up these issues with the concerned Nodal Officers. The PDs of PIUsICMUs located in near the State   Capital will assisting arranging such meeting with the Nodal Officers. (G.P.
